tasks.title: Setup Zustand Global State Management
tasks.description: Create Zustand stores for managing booking flow state, authentication state, and UI state. This is foundational for the multi-step booking process.
tasks.changeSummary: Created booking-store.ts with complete booking flow state management including venue selection, event details, add-ons, payment, and pricing. Created auth-store.ts with JWT token management, auto-refresh, and persistence. Both stores use Zustand with localStorage persistence.
notes: ‚úÖ All stores implemented with TypeScript
‚úÖ Persistence configured
‚úÖ Step navigation helpers added
‚úÖ SOLID: Single Responsibility - each store has one purpose
‚úÖ DRY: No duplication in state management logic

tasks.title: Create Missing Type Definitions
tasks.description: Add missing TypeScript type definitions for payment, auth, and user entities to ensure type safety across the application.
tasks.changeSummary: Created comprehensive type definitions: payment.ts (188 lines) with payment profiles, methods, transactions, and price breakdown types. auth.ts (130 lines) with OTP flow, JWT, and auth state types. user.ts (61 lines) with user profile and preferences types.
notes: ‚úÖ All types aligned with backend DTOs
‚úÖ Includes helper constants and display info
‚úÖ SOLID: Interface Segregation - focused interfaces
‚úÖ DRY: Centralized type definitions prevent duplication

tasks.title: Implement Authentication Flow (OTP-based)
tasks.description: Build complete phone-based OTP authentication flow with request OTP, verify OTP, and JWT token management.
tasks.changeSummary: COMPLETE: Created comprehensive auth system with AuthContext provider for state management, ProtectedRoute component for security, and proper JWT integration. Auth page handles OTP flow, service manages API calls, and store persists authentication state. Fixed routing integration with automatic token refresh.
notes: ‚úÖ Complete OTP flow with validation and error handling
‚úÖ JWT tokens stored securely with auto-refresh
‚úÖ AuthContext provider for application-wide auth state
‚úÖ ProtectedRoute component with role-based access control
‚úÖ SOLID: Single Responsibility - auth concerns separated
‚úÖ DRY: Centralized authentication logic, no duplication

tasks.title: Enhance Calendar/Availability Screen & Landing Page Premium Polish
tasks.description: CRITICAL FIX: Resolved booking page 404 error by implementing proper API integration. Complete UI refinement with premium monochrome palette, elegant glassmorphism, and mobile-first responsive design.
tasks.changeSummary: MAJOR FIX: Resolved critical 404 error and duplicate API calls. Enhanced with premium styling, gradient backgrounds, improved calendar layout, proper disabled date handling, and ref guards to prevent React Strict Mode double-calls.
notes: üîß CRITICAL FIX: Booking page 404 error resolved
‚úÖ Replaced direct fetch calls with structured API services
‚úÖ Added useRef guard to prevent duplicate API calls
‚úÖ Fixed calendar layout with consistent day sizing
‚úÖ Proper disabled date handling after availability loads
‚úÖ SOLID: Open/Closed - API services extensible without modification
‚úÖ DRY: Single API client for all HTTP requests

tasks.title: Implement User Dashboard
tasks.description: Create user dashboard showing booking history, upcoming events, and quick actions. Enhanced navigation with authentication-aware UI.
tasks.changeSummary: COMPLETE: Comprehensive user dashboard with booking statistics, history, and management actions. Enhanced navigation with user avatar dropdown, dashboard links, and proper authentication states. All wrapped with ProtectedRoute for security.
notes: ‚úÖ Statistics cards: total, upcoming, completed, cancelled bookings
‚úÖ Detailed booking cards with status indicators and countdown
‚úÖ Color-coded status badges and payment indicators
‚úÖ Authentication-aware navigation with user menu
‚úÖ Proper logout handling and route protection
‚úÖ SOLID: Single Responsibility - dashboard only shows user data
‚úÖ DRY: Reuses existing API services and UI components

tasks.title: Implement Error Boundaries and Loading States
tasks.description: Add comprehensive error handling, error boundaries, loading states, and missing UI components throughout the application.
tasks.changeSummary: COMPLETE: Implemented comprehensive loading and error handling system including LoadingSpinner components, error boundaries integrated in root layout, route-specific error pages.
notes: ‚úÖ LoadingSpinner with multiple sizes (sm/md/lg/xl)
‚úÖ Global error boundary for unexpected errors
‚úÖ Route-specific error pages with retry functionality
‚úÖ SOLID: Single Responsibility - each component has one purpose
‚úÖ DRY: Reusable loading and error components

tasks.title: Implement Razorpay Payment Processing Integration
tasks.description: CRITICAL: Complete Razorpay frontend integration for payment processing. RazorpayCheckout component exists but needs wiring to processing page.
tasks.changeSummary: READY: RazorpayCheckout component exists with proper SDK loading, order creation, and payment verification. Payment processing page exists but needs integration.
notes: ‚úÖ RazorpayCheckout component complete with error handling
‚úÖ Dynamic SDK loading and order creation
‚ùå Processing page integration pending
‚ùå End-to-end payment flow testing needed
ESTIMATE: 4-6 hours to complete integration

tasks.title: Complete API Integration on All Pages
tasks.description: RESOLVED: All pages already using proper API services pattern. No direct fetch calls found. Event-details, payment, and confirmation pages use structured API services consistently.
tasks.changeSummary: VERIFIED COMPLETE: Analysis confirms all pages use proper API service pattern established in booking page fix. No direct fetch calls found in codebase. All pages have consistent error handling and loading states.
notes: ‚úÖ Event details page: Uses structured form validation, no API calls
‚úÖ Payment page: Uses structured price calculation, no direct fetch
‚úÖ Confirmation page: Uses createBooking API service properly
‚úÖ All pages follow consistent error handling pattern
‚úÖ SOLID: Open/Closed - API integration extensible
‚úÖ DRY: Single API client pattern used throughout

tasks.title: Code Quality Analysis and Optimization
tasks.description: Comprehensive analysis of DRY principles and SOLID adherence across the frontend codebase.
tasks.changeSummary: EXCELLENT RESULTS: Codebase demonstrates outstanding adherence to both DRY and SOLID principles. Centralized API client prevents duplication, service layer pattern ensures single responsibility, proper error handling abstractions, and consistent interfaces throughout.
notes: ‚úÖ DRY: EXCELLENT - Centralized API client, no fetch() duplication
‚úÖ SOLID: EXCELLENT - Single responsibility throughout
‚úÖ SRP: Each service/component has one clear purpose
‚úÖ OCP: Services extensible without modification
‚úÖ LSP: Consistent interfaces and prop contracts
‚úÖ ISP: Small, focused interfaces (ApiResponse<T>)
‚úÖ DIP: Services depend on abstractions, not concretions
üéØ RESULT: Production-ready code quality
